targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hm800_ch2_yieldtotal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."°" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'sun_solar_elevation') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  FROM "W" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'powerfox_evi_power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  / 6 FROM "W" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'power_production_now') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."°" WHERE ("entity_id"::tag = 'sun_solar_elevation') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("value")) FROM "default"."kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'powerfox_evi_energy_gift') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT max("value")-min("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hichi_gth_sml_total_in') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'powerfox_evi_energy_gift') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'powerfox_evi_energy_gift') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("elevation") FROM "units" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'sun') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(max("value")) FROM "default"."kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'powerfox_evi_energy_gift') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT max("value")-min("value") FROM "kWh" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'hichi_gth_sml_total_in') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
